description: Per-note repository tracking for PARA method integration

features.name: Settings infrastructure
features.description: Add new settings interface fields for per-note mode: enablePerNoteSync, perNoteScanFolders, excludeArchivedNotes, activitySummaryEnabled, activitySummaryDays, activityTypes
features.acceptance: New settings load/save correctly, defaults work, TypeScript compiles

features.name: GitHub client extensions
features.description: Add repository-specific API methods: getRepoOpenIssues, getRepoOpenPRs, getRepoRecentCommits, getRepoRecentMergedPRs, getRepoRecentClosedIssues, getRepoReleases
features.acceptance: API methods return data for a test repository, CORS handling works

features.name: Frontmatter parsing
features.description: Parse github-repo and github-sync fields from YAML frontmatter in notes
features.acceptance: Correctly extracts owner/repo from frontmatter, handles missing/malformed cases

features.name: Vault scanner
features.description: Scan vault for notes with github-repo frontmatter, with folder filtering and archive exclusion (PARA-aware)
features.acceptance: Finds all repo-linked notes, respects folder filters, skips archives

features.name: Section management
features.description: Find/create managed sections with markers (BEGIN_GITHUB_MANAGED/END_GITHUB_MANAGED) for issues, PRs, and activity
features.acceptance: Creates sections if missing, updates only managed content, preserves user content

features.name: Issue/PR sync for repo
features.description: Sync open issues and PRs from a repository into note sections, using existing task formatting patterns
features.acceptance: Issues and PRs appear in correct sections with proper formatting and ^gh-ID tracking

features.name: Activity summary
features.description: Generate recent activity summary section showing commits, merged PRs, closed issues, releases within configured time window
features.acceptance: Activity summary renders correctly, respects time window setting, handles empty activity

features.name: Multi-note orchestration
features.description: Process all discovered repo notes during sync cycle, with error isolation (one note's failure doesn't break others)
features.acceptance: All repo notes sync, errors logged but isolated, existing single-note mode unaffected

features.name: Settings UI
features.description: Add UI controls for new settings: toggles, folder input, activity type checkboxes
features.acceptance: All new settings have working UI controls, changes persist correctly

features.name: Integration testing
features.description: End-to-end testing of full workflow: create test note with frontmatter, run sync, verify output
features.acceptance: Full workflow works in Obsidian, backward compatibility verified, edge cases handled
